Container.Name: Container-Mon
Container.Overview: Get notified when your Docker containers are unhealthy.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: container monitor healthcheck docker notification unraid shoutrrr

Config.Name: Schedule
Config.Description: Cron schedule for checking container health

Config.Name: Notification URL
Config.Description: Notification URL for Shoutrrr. Multiple services can be used with the | (pipe) character as a separator.

Config.Name: Fail Limit
Config.Description: Number of consecutive 'unhealthy' checks to reach before sending a notification

Config.Name: Use Labels
Config.Description: If true, will only monitor containers with the label containermon.enable=true set

Config.Name: Notify Health
Config.Description: If true will send a notification when an 'unhealthy' container returns to being 'healthy'

Config.Name: Check Stopped Containers
Config.Description: If true will consider stopped containers as 'unhealthy'. If false, you will only be notified for containers that have a healthcheck set

Config.Name: Notification Prefix
Config.Description: Custom text to be prefixed to all notification messages.

Config.Name: Docker Host
Config.Description: Internal path to Docker host. Not recommended to change.
